column5: any suggestions on Simcoe huts and which areas should i go to .  decided to head to simcoe for perch instead of splake....way to cold up past peterborough.  Need a hut operator in the middle of jumbo heaven please...LOL  Lefroy.....beaverton   or   gilford......
I've always fished out of beaverton and always had good luck there. If renting I use Floyds.
